alert.note: Alert for Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rapides, Evangeline, Avoyelles, northeastern St. Landry and northeastern Allen Parishes through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary and strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Bordelonville to 6 miles northwest of Glenmora. Movement was south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alexandria, Pineville, Oakdale, Ville Platte, Marksville, Bunkie, Mamou, Simmesport, Oberlin, Glenmora, Melville, Moreauville, Cheneyville, Elizabeth, Turkey Creek, Palmetto, Bordelonville, Bayou Current, Morrow and Effie. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 26 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Avoyelles; Evangeline; Rapides; St. Landry
